modName: DFB - Disable-Show Follower Bow And Arrows
summary:
Changes the default Companion Bow & Arrows to be visible by the player.
Also completely removes them from being re-added. ( Does not affect companions that already have the bow.
descriptionHtml:
==================================================================
= DFB - Disable Hidden Follower Bows & Arrows
==================================================================

==========
=Overview=
==========
-Changes the default Companion Bow & Arrows to be visible by the player.
-Also completely removes them from being re-added. ( Does not affect companions that already have the bow.

===========
= Changes =
===========
-Changes the default Companion Bow & Arrows to be visible by the player.
-Allows the player to take them from the follower that possess it.
-It has no value and slightly lower damage as the original Hunting Bow and Iron Arrows.
-Renamed to Cracked Hunting Bow and Rusted Iron Arrows.

=================
=Version History=
=================
=Version 1.0=
+Initial Release
author: Darkfirebird
